title: Keys To A New Beginning! Our 3 Bedroom Apartments Is Your New Home!
posting_body: > Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!
If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.
Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.
Home is a place to be proud of.
At Vermillion, we thrive on making sure our residents are proud of their homes.
Conveniently located near the town’s best dining, shopping and entertainment hotspots, you will always find a new adventure just around the corner.
Vermillion offers 2 & 3 bedroom apartment homes for our residents.
Each floor plan includes spacious bedrooms & walk in closets, fully equipped appliance package, washer & dryer connections, and central air conditioning.
Plus – water, sewer, & trash services are INCLUDED!

As far as community amenities, Vermillion has a community clubhouse with a fully equipped kitchen, outdoor swimming pool & playground, BBQ grill & picnic areas and professional on-site maintenance & management!
- New Outdoor Playground Area - COMING SOON!
- Refreshed Building & Exterior Updates - COMING SOON!
*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.
Vermillion Apartments participates in an affordable housing program.
Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $37,860 | 2 Occupants: $43,260 | 3
To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.
